definition: (mining) roof fall/to have the roof cave in
to emit/to give off/to send out (or up, forth)/to brave/to face/reckless/to falsely adopt (sb's identity etc)/to feign/(literary) to cover

apex/crown of the head/top/roof/most/to carry on the head/to push to the top/to go against/to replace/to substitute/to be subjected to (an aerial bombing, hailstorm etc)/(slang) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/classifier for headwear, hats, veils etc

sentences.english: Roof fall in mines is one of the severe disasters in mining operation.
sentences.chinese: 矿山冒顶是矿山生产过程中严重灾害之一。

sentences.english: Finally technological methods were brought out to prevent roof falling on bolt support mining roadway.
sentences.chinese: 最后提出了防治描杆支护煤巷冒顶的技术途径。

sentences.english: Fault tree analysis for collapse of roadways with fractured surrounding rock and high tectonic stress in jinchuan mine no.
sentences.chinese: 金川二矿区不良岩层采场巷道片帮冒顶事故树分析。

sentences.english: The reason and forecast of roof falling are analyzed. And the preventive measures are provided.
sentences.chinese: 分析了冒顶事故的发生原因和预兆，提出了预防措施。

sentences.english: The roof falling accident is the most commonly occurring accidents in coal mines mining process.
sentences.chinese: 矿山井下开采过程中，最常发生的事故就是冒顶事故。

sentences.english: Roof fall can not be completely avoided in construction of hydraulic tunnels.
sentences.chinese: 冒顶塌方在水工隧洞施工过程中难以完全避免。

definition: corner kick (in soccer)/free strike in hockey
to lift a siege/to help sb out of trouble or embarrassment
Tadich (name)/Boris Tadić (1958-), Serbian politician, president from 2004
an overhung door/a door that hinges upwards
to set up a teammate (with an opportunity to score)/to throw a game
